item.name: GET Book collection of Serie (from volume).

variable.description: Current volume
`slug` of author in `meta.author` series' list, in case of multiple authors, default author is selected so you need to refer to series' list and not authors' list, example: `fforde-jasper`
`slug` of serie in `meta.slug` series' list, example: `thursday-next-en`

request.description:
Books list from one Serie, find by slug from volume and limited to 10 results.

Route name: `api.v1.series.current`

query.description: filters[tag,genre] Type of Tag, 'tag' by default.

request.description:
Get all Tags ordered by 'name'.

Route name: `api.v1.tags.index`

query.description: filters[tag,genre] Type of Tag, 'tag' by default.

variable.description: `slug` of serie in `meta.slug` tags' list, example: `classics`
`slug` of serie in `meta.slug` tags' list, example: `relationships`

request.description:
Get all Books of selected Tag.

Route name: `api.v1.tags.show.books`
